job_title: Software Engineer - Core Platform Test - Software Engineering
job_description: <h2><br /><b>Company:</b></h2>Qualcomm Technologies, Inc.<p style="text-align:inherit"></p><h2><b>Job Area:</b></h2>Engineering Group, Engineering Group &gt; Software Engineering<p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:left"><u><b>General Summary:</b></u></p><p><b>Join Our Innovative Team</b><br /><span>Be part of the Core Platform Test team driving quality and reliability for Snapdragon SoC-based products. You’ll work on test content development, automation, and validation of essential platform components like Hypervisor, USB, PMIC, PCIe, Boot, and Storage. This is an opportunity to learn cutting-edge technologies and grow in a collaborative environment.</span></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:left"><u><b>Minimum Qualifications:</b></u></p>• Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field.<p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><div><b>Skills and Requirements</b></div><ul><li>Proficiency in<span> </span><b>C/C&#43;&#43; and Python</b></li><li>Basic understanding of<span> </span><b>system software and firmware validation</b></li><li>Familiarity with<span> </span><b>ARM architecture</b>, Linux, and RTOS concepts</li><li>Exposure to<span> </span><b>test automation frameworks</b> and scripting</li><li>Strong problem-solving and debugging skills</li><li>Good communication and teamwork abilities</li></ul><div><b>Opportunities and Responsibilities</b></div><div>As an Engineer, you will:</div><ul><li>Execute test plans and validate platform components</li><li>Develop and maintain automated test scripts</li><li>Collaborate with senior engineers to troubleshoot and resolve issues</li><li>Learn and apply best practices in test methodology and software quality</li><li><div>Contribute to continuous improvement of test processes</div></li><li><div>Deliver high-quality output on assigned tasks with some supervision<span> </span></div></li><li><div>Use verbal and written communication skills to convey routine information to knowledgeable colleagues<span> </span></div></li><li><div>Exercise creativity in troubleshooting technical challenges and navigating novel circumstances<span> </span></div><div></div></li></ul><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><div><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:left"><span>Qualcomm is an equal opportunity employer. If you are an individual with a disability and need an accommodation during the application/hiring process, rest assured that Qualcomm is committed to providing an accessible process. You may e-mail </span><a target="_blank" href="mailto:disability-accomodations&#64;qualcomm.com"><span><span><span class="WGI1">disability-accomodations&#64;qualcomm.com</span></span></span></a><span> or call Qualcomm&#39;s toll-free number found </span><a target="_blank" href="https://qualcomm.service-now.com/hrpublic?id&#61;hr_public_article_view&amp;sysparm_article&#61;KB0039028">here</a><span>. Upon request, Qualcomm will provide reasonable accommodations to support individuals with disabilities to be able participate in the hiring process. Qualcomm is also committed to making our workplace accessible for individuals with disabilities. (Keep in mind that this email address is used to provide reasonable accommodations for individuals with disabilities. We will not respond here to requests for updates on applications or resume inquiries).</span></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p></div><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:left"><b>To all Staffing and Recruiting Agencies</b>:<span><span> </span></span>Our Careers Site is only for individuals seeking a job at Qualcomm. Staffing and recruiting agencies and individuals being represented by an agency are not authorized to use this site or to submit profiles, applications or resumes, and any such submissions will be considered unsolicited. Qualcomm does not accept unsolicited resumes or applications from agencies. Please do not forward resumes to our jobs alias, Qualcomm employees or any other company location. Qualcomm is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited <span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span class="WGI1">resumes/applications.</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></p><p style="text-align:left"><b><span><span>EEO Employer: Qualcomm is an equal opportunity employer; all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, Veteran status, or any other protected classification.</span></span></b></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:left"><span>Qualcomm expects its employees to abide by all applicable policies and procedures, including but not limited to security and other requirements regarding protection of Company confidential information and other confidential and/or proprietary information, to the extent those requirements are permissible under applicable law.</span></p><p style="text-align:inherit"> </p><p></p><p><b>Pay range </b><b><span>and Other Compensation &amp; Benefits</span></b><b>: </b></p>$94,200.00 - $141,200.00<p></p><p><span>The above pay scale reflects the broad, minimum to maximum, pay scale for this job code for the location for which it has been posted. Even more importantly, please note that salary is only one component of total compensation at Qualcomm. We also offer a competitive annual discretionary bonus program and opportunity for annual RSU grants (employees on sales-incentive plans are not eligible for our annual bonus). In addition, our highly competitive benefits package is designed to support your success at work, at home, and at play. Your recruiter will be happy to discuss all that Qualcomm has to offer – and you can review more details about our US benefits at this </span><a href="https://secure-web.cisco.com/12dSRK2Rv2BLs82tpwDIWbiIUl-i98Bz7rRRVxcN6qa7Qli-INbv0fpz4yUu06mlX9VYFd3vscb7TeX0JNz7BC9w3OvnlmHfXdZB1J3-01baO99qUjTOsGBxu8o3he-yBMtaQlF1TE3-vQtrpW4lUPMnSnTI246LZTZgsyCyDT_MuHsrvlJSxx4yBCcjnDdYuCy0PCUABDhfhvOlhdubErcCDUMp9O-RUoHl4WQ6OhAasmuuZITZorC1Yt0GpYLmfly0bXb2hLBZberjmiT6wDkWT5wyqSuH7yHBaM-0ARNTNLLV4AZ_qZE4k9rl24d3Y9CZC14RRiu198VTP-Lx9zee2pfRx15exBSTRhJwEe1JlVXen9jW79DAXHJLu9oP9fEpGEPzBufcasieRAMMZ_hxF_CO-zysnXuBr2iS4-zfIETonK9Jcx2BA_ZqHMiJtCp-QK30kJlGrRvs_ycYXsAmFOFITxRDnUbukzMsxK8UaN2D4ufDUgSsx161_2XhxK4pRsmjZrH1HEO4RpJSdXA/https%3A%2F%2Fwww.qualcomm.com%2Fcompany%2Fcareers%2Fbenefits" target="_blank">link</a><span>.</span></p><p></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:left"><span>If you would like more information about this role, please contact </span><a target="_blank" href="http://www.qualcomm.com/contact/corporate">Qualcomm Careers</a><span>.</span></p>
